entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
